description:
Visualize Cortex Performance
Cortex is a High Available, Horizontally Scalable Prometheus as a Service

panels.description: Number of metrics ingested per second. Note that a metric is essentially one data point in a metric series.
panels.title: Metrics Ingested Per Second

panels.description: DynamoDB Write Capacity Units. AWS charges ~$0.000725 per WCU per hour (US-WEST-1 as of 1/03/19)
panels.title: Total Provisioned Write Capacity

panels.description: 95 Percentile age of chunks stored in ingesters. Ideally we want chunks to last at least 12 hours so that queries on recent data is fast
panels.title: Chunk Age (95%)

panels.description: DynamoDB Read Capacity Units. AWS charges ~$0.000125 per WCU per hour (US-WEST-1 as of 1/03/19)
panels.title: Total Provisioned Read Capacity

panels.description: Success rate of fulfilled queries (from query-frontend)
panels.title: Query Error Rate

panels.description: How long it takes queries to be executed once they reach query-frontend (perceived duration)
panels.title: Query request duration

panels.description: Queries in the queue for query-frontend. If this reaches 100, new query requests will be dropped with a HTTP 429 response
panels.title: Queued Queries

panels.description: The average age of queries in the query-frontend queue
panels.title: Queued Queries Age

panels.description:
Time queries sit in the queue before being executed
95% of queries begin execution within this time period
panels.title: Query Queue Age (95%)

panels.description: relevant for seriesstore
panels.title: Index Lookups per Query

panels.description: relevant for seriesstore
panels.title: Index Lookups per Query

panels.description: Number of samples in ingesters to be flushed
panels.title: Ingester Flush Queue Length

panels.description:
PUT: Cache write requests

New PUT: Cache write requests with new entries

Eviction: Cache entries evicted
panels.title: FIFO Cache Writes

panels.description:
Get: Read from cache request

Get Stale: Get for an entry which expired

Get Misses: Get for no valid entry
panels.title: FIFO Cache Reads

panels.description: DynamoDB Configured Write Capacity limits for each table
panels.title: DynamoDB Write Quotas

panels.description: DynamoDB Configured Read Capacity limits for each table
panels.title: DynamoDB Read Quotas

panels.description: Rate of "ProvisionedThroughputExceededException" errors per second from AWS APIs
panels.title: Write Errors

panels.description: Rate of "ProvisionedThroughputExceededException" errors per second from AWS APIs
panels.title: Read Errors

panels.description: rate of how many times cortex has to re-attempt queries against dynamodb. High values here indicate lots of errors or throttling in the backend, and can result in the query queue increasing.
panels.title: DynamoDB Query Retries

panels.description: Rate of requests Cortex makes to CassandraDB.
panels.title: QPS

title: Cortex Performance
